about_the_game:
Embark on a charming journey with Mall Manager, a heartwarming mall management simulator crafted by an indie developer passionate about bringing your retail dreams to life. This game combines thoughtful strategy with a personal touch, allowing you to create, manage, and grow a shopping center that reflects your style and vision.

key Features:

  • Tailor-Made Design: Control every detail of your mall, from the layout of shops and aisles to the placement of decorations. Whether you envision a quaint series of specialty stores or a vast all-in-one shopping destination, your choices shape the customer experience.
  • Varied Settings: Choose from different environments like the bustling City or peaceful Farmland to locate your mall. Each setting offers unique challenges and adds a special flavor to your retail empire.
  • Strategic Management: Decide between Emma, a genius at customer relations, or Ethan, a financial guru, to help guide your mall to success. Their expertise will influence your approach to growth and customer satisfaction.
  • Dynamic Gameplay: Experience the joys and challenges of running a mall with real-time decisions that affect your business. Watch as your manager helps navigate the ins and outs of retail management, making every day at your mall unique.

Mall Manager invites you to dive into a world where your retail decisions make a difference. Developed with love and attention to detail, this indie game aims to provide a relaxing yet engaging experience for all who dream of managing their own mall. Join us on this delightful adventure and let your mall story unfold.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4092 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
